Three consecutive days of record cases, culminating in 104 new infections being recorded on Saturday, has seen the borough overtake Harrogate for the worst in the county.
Saturday was the fifth time… [+1311 chars]

articles.title: Live coronavirus updates as Boris Johnson makes important vaccine announcement - ExaminerLive
articles.description: Many experts have welcomed the news of the Pfizer vaccine but prime minister Boris Johnson has urged caution
articles.content:
Extra support for families and children this winter
A new £170m Covid Winter Grant Scheme will be run by councils in England.

articles.author: By Xantha Leatham For The Daily Mail
articles.title: Charities urge Boris not to abandon cancer patients in second coronavirus wave - Daily Mail
articles.description: In a letter signed by 50 charities and doctors, the head of Cancer Research UK demands a firm commitment that diagnosis, treatment and clinical trials will not be delayed again.
articles.content:
Leading charities today plead with Boris Johnson to protect cancer sufferers after millions were abandoned during the first Covid-19 lockdown.
